content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!-- edited with XMLSpy v2014 sp1 (x64) (http://www.altova.com) by XMLSpy 2013 Professional Ed. Release 2, Installed for 6 users (with SMP from 2013-10-18 to 2014-10-19) (NOAA) --> <xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified">  <xs:include schemaLocation="BasicTypes.xsd"/>  <xs:include schemaLocation="Comments.xsd"/>  <xs:complexType name="StatsLNMType">   <xs:complexContent>    <xs:extension base="TableType">     <xs:sequence>      <xs:element name="MS_SBES" type="xs:float"/>      <xs:element name="MS_MBES" type="xs:float"/>      <xs:element name="MS_lidar" type="xs:float"/>      <xs:element name="MS_SSS" type="xs:float"/>      <xs:element name="MS_SBES_MBES" type="xs:float"/>      <xs:element name="MS_MBES_SSS" type="xs:float"/>      <xs:element name="MS_SBES_SSS" type="xs:float"/>      <xs:element name="XL_MBES_SBES" type="xs:float"/>      <xs:element name="XL_lidar" type="xs:float"/>     </xs:sequence>    </xs:extension>   </xs:complexContent>  </xs:complexType>  <xs:complexType name="VesselLNMType">   <xs:sequence>    <xs:element name="hullID" type="HullIDType"/>    <xs:element name="statistics" type="StatsLNMType"/>   </xs:sequence>  </xs:complexType>  <xs:complexType name="SurveyStatisticsType">   <xs:sequence>    <xs:element name="LNM">     <xs:annotation>      <xs:documentation>List for each vessel (ship and/or launch number(s)) and the combined total of all vessels, the following information (NOTE: Any lineal nautical miles that are deleted for any reason should not be included):</xs:documentation>     </xs:annotation>     <xs:complexType>      <xs:all>       <xs:element name="vesselLNM">        <xs:complexType>         <xs:sequence>          <xs:element name="vessel" type="VesselLNMType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>         </xs:sequence>        </xs:complexType>       </xs:element>       <xs:element name="totalLNM" type="TotalLNMType"/>      </xs:all>     </xs:complexType>    </xs:element>    <xs:element name="totalSurveyStats">     <xs:annotation>      <xs:documentation>List for the total survey the number of bottom samples collected, total number of square nautical miles, and the number of items investigated that required additional time/effort in the field.</xs:documentation>     </xs:annotation>     <xs:complexType>      <xs:complexContent>       <xs:extension base="TotalSurveyStatisticsType"/>      </xs:complexContent>     </xs:complexType>    </xs:element>    <xs:element name="surveyDates" type="xs:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">     <xs:annotation>      <xs:documentation>Note: Dates of acquisition should reflect the days of work for the referenced survey only, not the total project.</xs:documentation>     </xs:annotation>    </xs:element>    <xs:element name="discussion" type="DiscussionType" nillable="true"/>    <xs:element name="images" type="ImageType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>    <xs:element name="comments" type="CommentType" nillable="true"/>   </xs:sequence>  </xs:complexType>  <xs:complexType name="TotalLNMType">   <xs:complexContent>    <xs:extension base="StatsLNMType">     <xs:sequence>      <xs:element name="percentXLLNM" type="xs:float"/>     </xs:sequence>    </xs:extension>   </xs:complexContent>  </xs:complexType>  <xs:complexType name="TotalSurveyStatisticsType">   <xs:complexContent>    <xs:extension base="TableType">     <xs:sequence>      <xs:element name="bottomSamples" type="xs:nonNegativeInteger"/>      <xs:element name="AWOIS" type="xs:nonNegativeInteger"/>      <xs:element name="maritimeBoundaryPoints" type="xs:nonNegativeInteger"/>      <xs:element name="DP" type="xs:nonNegativeInteger"/>      <xs:element name="diveOps" type="xs:nonNegativeInteger"/>      <xs:element name="SNM" type="xs:float"/>     </xs:sequence>    </xs:extension>   </xs:complexContent>  </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>
